S.FORM: == Bananarama == Pins'rux sa kawas tay 1981 quw qutux gluw na pinglgan mqwas kya Igiris. Bananarama hya' ga cyugal quw msbalq balay na msrangi' ka, Sara Dallin, Siobhan Faheyy, Keren Woodward qaniy quw msqun ps'rux. maki sa Cins' Sekkay kirok hya' ga, yaquw Onggak na pzyugi' ruw Sinxalan mqwas sa qwas na Lyuko Unggakquw wal naha siy galiy kyaquw spzyang balay thuzyay tayhuk sa krahu' lalu' na blaq balay pongan qwas na pinglgan na knayril, pinmopuw phtuw qwas na Rekoto' qwas naha' nanak. wal naha' galun uziy qwas na sinxalan mqwas uziy, Top 10 qwas sinxalan qasa ga: "It Ain't What You Do..."(1982), "Really Saying Something" (1982), "Shy Boy" (1982), "Cruel Summer" (1983), "Robert De Niro's Waiting..." (1984), " (1986)", "Love in the First Degree", "I Heard a Rumour" (1987). nanu' squw kawas sa 1986, qwas naha' ka "Venus" wal magal cyanpyong na binkgan lalu' na qwas na lyokokya Amerika' ruw binkgan lalu' maki' tay glang lalu' kya Egiris (UK Top 10 hits). mawpuw qutux quw qwas naha' qwas na sinxalan mqwas quw wal magal binkgan qwas kya Amerika'. Billboard Hot 100 (1983–88), kwara' kin na sazing qwas ka wal mzyup sa binkgan lalu' tay 10 qwas naha' "Cruel Summer"(1984) ruw "I Heard a Rumour"(1987) qasa. byacing sqaniy lga , cyux t'aring lawziy squw 'awsa' naha hmgwiru' squw SenSekay mqwas lawziy, kawas 'nyal ka 2018 lga, musa' tmasuq kya squw kita' Amerika Syuw la.

== Bananarama == Pins'rox sa kawas tay 1981 qow qotox glow na pinglgan mqwas kya Igiris. Bananarama hya' ga cyogal qow msbalq balay na msrangi' ka, Sara Dallin, Siobhan Faheyy, Keren Woodward qaniy qow msqon ps'rox. maki sa Cins' Sekkay kirok hya' ga, yaqow Onggak na pzyogi' row Sinxalan mqwas sa qwas na Lyoko Unggakqow wal naha siy galiy kyaqow spzyang balay thozyay tayhok sa kraho' lalo' na blaq balay pongan qwas na pinglgan na knayril, pinmopow phtow qwas na Rekoto' qwas naha' nanak. wal naha' galon oziy qwas na sinxalan mqwas oziy, Top 10 qwas sinxalan qasa ga: "It Ain't What Yoo Do..."(1982), "Really Saying Something" (1982), "Shy Boy" (1982), "Croel Sommer" (1983), "Robert De Niro's Waiting..." (1984), " (1986)", "Love in the First Degree", "I Heard a Romoor" (1987). nano' sqow kawas sa 1986, qwas naha' ka "Venos" wal magal cyanpyong na binkgan lalo' na qwas na lyokokya Amerika' row binkgan lalo' maki' tay glang lalo' kya Egiris (UK Top 10 hits). mawpow qotox qow qwas naha' qwas na sinxalan mqwas qow wal magal binkgan qwas kya Amerika'. Billboard Hot 100 (1983–88), kwara' kin na sazing qwas ka wal mzyop sa binkgan lalo' tay 10 qwas naha' "Croel Sommer"(1984) row "I Heard a Romoor"(1987) qasa. byacing sqaniy lga , cyox t'aring lawziy sqow 'awsa' naha hmgwiro' sqow SenSekay mqwas lawziy, kawas 'nyal ka 2018 lga, mosa' tmasoq kya sqow kita' Amerika Syow la.
